groups.title: ISIQEPHU A: INDABA
groups.instructions: Khetha isihloko ESISODWA kwezilandelayo ubhale ngaso indaba ibe ngamagama ayi 190 kuya kwangama-240. QAPHELA: Bhala uhlaka lwendaba yakho lube sekhasini lwalo lodwa.

questions.text: Indawo okhulele kuyo inobuhle nobubi empilweni yakho.
Isithombe sendoda evale ubuso ngezandla kanti kuneminwe eminingi ekhomba yona.
questions.context: Khetha isithombe ESISODWA kulezi ezilandelayo bese ubhala indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo (1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8) bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayihambisane nesithombe/nokwenzeka esithombeni.

questions.text: Isithombe somuntu ohlezi otshanini obheka phezulu lapho kunendiza endizayo khona.
questions.context: Khetha isithombe ESISODWA kulezi ezilandelayo bese ubhala indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo (1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8) bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayihambisane nesithombe/nokwenzeka esithombeni.

questions.text: Isithombe sowesifazane ophethe imaski emoyizelayo eyibeke phambi kobuso bakhe kanti ubuso bakhe bangempela bukhombisa usizi nezinyembezi.
questions.context: Khetha isithombe ESISODWA kulezi ezilandelayo bese ubhala indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo (1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8) bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayihambisane nesithombe/nokwenzeka esithombeni.

groups.title: ISIQEPHU B: IMIBHALO EMIDE EDLULISA IMIYALEZO
groups.instructions: Khetha isihloko ESISODWA kwezilandelayo ubhale ngaso kube ngamagama angama 80 kuya kwayi-100.

questions.text: Bhalela imenenja yerestorenti incwadi ukhononde ngalesi senzo sikaweta.
questions.scenario: Ubuzikhiphile nabangani bakho niyodla erestorenti. Uweta obenisiza uniphathe kabi.
Umzala wakho ongumdlali kumabonakude uSipho Mabaso oneminyaka engama-35 ushone emveni kokugula isikhashana. Njengelungu lomndeni ucelwe ukuba ubhale umlando wakhe.
UMasipala wangakini ubehlele umcimbi osezingeni eliphezulu wokujabulisa abantu abadala.

questions.text: Bhala inkulumo elungiselelwe ozoyethula kulo mphakathi.
questions.scenario: Umphakathi wangakini ukumeme ukuba uzokwethula inkulumo ekhuthaza intsha nabazali ngekhono lokubhala izinkondlo.

groups.title: ISIQEPHU C: IMIBHALO EMIFISHANE EDLULISA IMIYALEZO
groups.instructions: Khetha isihloko ESISODWA ubhale ngaso kube ngamagama angama-60 kuya kwangama-80.

questions.scenario: Uvule isitolo esidayisa izinhlobonhlobo zemibhede yokulala.
Kunezinto ongazithandi ezenzeka eqenjini otadisha nalo njengoba nibhala izivivinyo. Phawula ngalezi zinto ku-WhatsApp waleli qembu lenu.
Umakhelwane wakho ucele ukuba umuphe iresiphi azoyisebenzisa uma osa inyama.
